channel.title: Stuck on loading 1% on matrix client- tried everything need help plz!
channel.description:
i've tried everything to try to fix it but nothing is working
i get the checking for updates 1% and doesn't change i've sat there for 20minutes. if someone can please help me i would appreciate it
if you can email/msn me @ d3athbyn1ght@hotmail.com

item.title: Stuck on loading 1% on matrix client- tried everything need help plz!
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

run3scap3_uk:

You need to download the original cache and extract the cache to your C: folder.

I think you don`t need to put Cache on C:, you actually need to place it on your Server Folder > data > cache

Read full topic
